column1:
RT @GovMurphy: The evidence is overwhelming and the experts are clear: #COVID19 is more lethal inside than outside.

It's too soon to openâ€¦

I respectfully disagree. Trump is a documented congenital liar and disrespectful on an hourly basis. Add to that the lack of preparedness and sensitivity re the coronavirus issue and there's more than enough to counter what many believe is some one-sided matchups. Hell No...
